website_summaries.verdict: This brush is almost twice as long as most of the others and has a lot of scrubbing surface.
pros: Synthetic fiber bristles won't mold easily
A good choice for people with a limited range of motion
Loop and length lets you easily reach between your toes to clean your feet
Bristles are firm, but not too hard
cons: The bristles are less firm than they may appear to be
Some might like them to be stronger for better exfoliation

customer_reviews.title: Finally, Long Enough

customer_reviews.title: Long term disappointment
